DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of CDP870 self-injection administered for 24 weeks or longer in subjects who are participating in the long-term treatment study (Study 275-08-002 or Study 275-08-004) of CDP870 administered concomitantly with or without Methotrexate.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Treatment Study of CDP870 Self-injection in Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Who Are Participating in the Long-term Treatment Studies (Study 275-08-002 or Study 275-08-004) of CDP870
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have completed the treatment in the parent clinical studies (NCT00851318 and NCT00850343) up to 52 weeks Subjects who are willing to undertake selfinjection and provide a written consent Patients with serious adverse events Patients who are judged by the investigator/subinvestigator to be ineligible to participation in the study for reasons such as uncooperative attitude or nonadherence to study procedures.
